Name: Prospector
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Complex and strong with all three ingredients balancing and enhancing each other.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Thomas Waugh at Prospect, San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Prospector contains 239 calories
